Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.Actor.EnemyPlane

Class EnemyPlane

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
com.example.demo.Actor.ActiveActor
com.example.demo.Actor.ActiveActorDestructible
com.example.demo.Actor.FighterPlane
com.example.demo.Actor.EnemyPlane.EnemyPlane
All Implemented Interfaces:
Destructible, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class EnemyPlane extends FighterPlane
The EnemyPlane class represents an enemy plane in the game. It extends FighterPlane and provides functionality for updating its position, firing projectiles, and handling the plane's interactions with the game world.

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private static final double
    FIRE_RATE
    The fire rate of the enemy plane, which determines how often it fires projectiles.
    private static final int
    HORIZONTAL_VELOCITY
    The horizontal velocity at which the enemy plane moves, representing its speed.
    private static final int
    IMAGE_HEIGHT
    The height of the enemy plane's image.
    private static final String
    IMAGE_NAME
    The image name of the enemy plane, used to load its sprite.
    private static final int
    IMAGE_WIDTH
    The width of the enemy plane's image.
    private static final int
    INITIAL_HEALTH
    The initial health of the enemy plane, which starts at 1.
    private static final double
    PROJECTILE_X_POSITION_OFFSET
    The X-axis offset used to determine the projectile's position when fired by the enemy plane.
    private static final double
    PROJECTILE_Y_POSITION_OFFSET
    The Y-axis offset used to determine the projectile's position when fired by the enemy plane.

      private static final double FIRE_RATE

    • updatePosition

      public void updatePosition()
      Updates the enemy plane's position by moving it horizontally at a constant speed.
      Specified by:

    • fireProjectiles

      public List<ActiveActorDestructible> fireProjectiles()
      Fires projectiles from the enemy plane at a rate determined by the FIRE_RATE.
      Specified by:
      fireProjectiles in class FighterPlane
      Returns:
      A list of projectiles fired by the enemy plane.

    • updateActor

      public void updateActor()
      Updates the enemy plane's actor state. This method is called every game tick to update the plane's position and hitbox.
      Specified by:
      updateActor in class ActiveActorDestructible
